alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 6:40PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Noxubee and Kemper Counties through 730 PM CST... At 639 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near De Kalb, or 12 miles north of Meridian Station, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Porterville around 650 PM CST. Electric Mills around 700 PM CST. Cooksville around 725 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Scooba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for east central Mississippi.
